ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Ziltus! we wanted a LAN gaming table!!! Hehehehe
ygData.msgSnippet: Congrats Ziltus :)  Hmm next time must ask u how to get GF and still be able to play games at same time :) Still single and getting older hehe. Maybe can ask
ygData.messageBody:
Congrats Ziltus :) Hmm next time must ask u how to
get GF and still be able to play games at same time :)
Still single and getting older hehe. Maybe can ask yur
wife to recommend some friends to me, I promised i'll
take a bath and put on my best armor .....er i mean
clothes for the meeting :)

Trifrost the old Bachelor


> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Anson" <hannibal@...>
> To: "Sg-Everquest" <sg-everquest@egroups.com>
> Sent: Thursday, September 07, 2000 12:46 AM
> Subject: [sg-everquest] Ziltus! we wanted a LAN
> gaming table!!! Hehehehe
>
>
> >
> > Hi everyone,
> >
> > Just thought I'd let everyone know that Ziltus has
> been happily married
> > today to a pretty lady he
> > now calls his wife! (officially at least)
> >
> > It was a fun time for all of us who attended as we
> finally got to put
> faces
> > to all the nicks we've been
> > calling each other by online. FYI...Galarion,
> Kellendil, Merns, Leshrec,
> > Bibi, Massiah and myself (Zanderion)
> > were there and in fact all of us except Bibi (who
> was busy with wife) went
> > for a drink at the nearby
> > Starbucks after the dinner.
> > Recalling the good old times and just chatting
> about gaming brought back
> > many good memories and funny
> > conversation. Pity Ziltus wasn't able to join us
> much but i'm sure he's
> > happily busy right now kekekeke!!
> >
> > Oh and we missed you too Fesse! Were hoping we
> could see you and put a
> face
> > to that sexy Dark Elf butt i've
> > been staring at soooo mucchhh!!!!! Oh well there's
> always a next time!
> >
> > Finally, this is also a chance for those of you
> who weren't there to give
> > him your congrats! :)
> > Lets all wish him a great happy (productive!)
> future with his newly wedded
> > beautiful wife!
> >
> > C O N G R A T S!! Ziltus from all of us...
> >
> > Was great fun and i hope to see all of you
> sometime again! Tata for now...
> >
> > Signing off,
> > Yours truly - Zanderion (D2 username as well!)
> >
> > p.s. Got a barbarian Diablo2 action figure i
> bought for you with me, Kar
> > Wai! Collect it from me
> > sometime eh? Didn't want to embarass you by giving
> it to you in front of
> so
> > many ppl lah hehe..
> > Then we all got excuse to go LAN gaming or
> something! hehehe
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > Singapore Everquest Players List
> >
>
>
> Singapore Everquest Players List
